channel.title: I need help it wont let me change any settings
channel.description:
Ok i just tried a whole big step by step on what i did WITH pictures and I am on a laptop so I accidentaly clicked backspace and so im going to make this fast.
Step 1)I go into the character settings and change the rights to 0 to 3. I then save it. Step 2)I go into compile.bat and I compile it,and it said Compiled Successfuly!(there were no errors) Step 3)I go into runserver.bat and I run server. Step 4)I go into my server,Checking the character file,and the 3 is still there but it didnt change in the actual game. Step 5)I log out. I then go back and look into my character settings and its automaticly Reset itself to 0.

item.title: I need help it wont let me change any settings

item.title: I need help it wont let me change any settings
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

open up your client and search for like “Admin = 2”, should be a list of people with there name on it and the player rights, just copy one and paste below the “}” change the name to your name, and change the rights to 3…

Read full topic

item.title: I need help it wont let me change any settings
item.dc:creator: @bestpkerever bestpkerever
item.description:
@bestpkerever wrote:

Ok i just tried a whole big step by step on what i did WITH pictures and I am on a laptop so I accidentaly clicked backspace and so im going to make this fast.

Step 1)I go into the character settings and change the rights to 0 to 3. I then save it.
Step 2)I go into compile.bat and I compile it,and it said Compiled Successfuly!(there were no errors)
Step 3)I go into runserver.bat and I run server.
Step 4)I go into my server,Checking the character file,and the 3 is still there but it didnt change in the actual game.
Step 5)I log out. I then go back and look into my character settings and its automaticly Reset itself to 0.
